actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the requirement that a member of the armed forces maintain a household in the United States to be eligible for an earned income credit.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the requirement that a member of the Armed forces maintain a household in the United States to be eligible for an earned income credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the requirement that a member of the armed forces maintain a household in the United States to be eligible for an earned income credit.
